document.full_text: radiation injuries to three workers complicated the battle to control japan's earthquake-damaged nuclear plant while fear of contamination from the world's worst nuclear crisis in 25 years grew both at home and abroad.
document.title: radiation injuries hinder work at japan's nuclear plant
lines_and_colors: radiation injuries to three workers complicated the battle to control japan's earthquake-damaged nuclear plant while fear of contamination from the world's worst nuclear crisis in 25 years grew both at home and abroad.
